response.explain: The previous action code was trying to put the hamburger into the microwave, but according to the observed relations, the hamburger is already inside the microwave. Therefore, the action was unnecessary and we can move on to the next subtask.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the microwave
(2) Close the microwave
(3) Heat the hamburger up in the microwave
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 3: Close the microwave
    microwave = registry(env,"microwave_bfbeeb_0")
    close(robot, microwave)
    donothing(env)
